SepsisDiagnosis: exists ({name startswith /sepsis/i; scope = SNOMED}) from time(Culture) - 1 day to time(Culture) + 30 days
SepsisOnset:
first time(union(
  Antimicrobial where (exists Culture from time(Antimicrobial) to time(Antimicrobial) + 24 hours),  
  Culture where (exists Antimicrobial from time(Culture) to time(Culture) + 24 hours)
)) from #mintime to #maxtime
Cohort:
(
((SepsisOnset - time({id = 'SNOMED/3950001'; scope = SNOMED})) as years >= 18) and
(exists {id in ('SNOMED/449431000124100', 'SNOMED/281685003', 'SNOMED/11545006'); scope = SNOMED} from SepsisOnset - 30 days to SepsisOnset)) where #value
